Literature.Title: Synergistic effect of two antimicrobial peptides, Nisin and P10 with conventional antibiotics against extensively drug-resistant Acinetobacter baumannii and colistin-resistant Pseudomonas aeruginosa isolates.
Literature.Author: Jahangiri A, Neshani A, Mirhosseini SA, Ghazvini K, Zare H, Sedighian H

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter baumannii AB1(MIC=8µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii AB2(MIC=32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii AB3(MIC=16µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 1(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 5(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µg/ml)
